reviewText: I enjoyed the walking thru of the actual doing it yourself..am not into watching others be silly and seeing them act on stage.which is not for me..but the walking thru step by step DVD was excellent if you want to do it yourself...I did watch the entire program and the best is the 2nd DVD that is included.
I can't wait till Netflix's offers this movie on there instant stream. It's worth owning a copy. Very helpful video for many people. This video will inspire you to create more in you life.
